name: OR_LOG_SPECNEED
description: The OR_LOG_SPECNEED table contains OR management system log special needs.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the special needs entered for the log.

columns.name: SPECIAL_NEEDS
columns.description: The special needs entered for the log.
